definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Studying home economics to set up the concept of family ties.
sentences.chinese: 加強家政學研究，培養健康文明的家庭觀念。

sentences.english: Cooking skills are taught in Home Economics.
sentences.chinese: 在家政學中有教授多種烹調技能。

sentences.english: Home Economics is a subject about cooking and sewing.
sentences.chinese: 家政學是一門關於烹飪和縫紉的學科。

sentences.english: These are the basics they teach in Home Economics.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是家政學的基本內容。

sentences.english: My favourite place is Home Economics .
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的學科是家政學。
